quienes_somos:
We are FUNDACIÓN CRUXES:
▪ Promoting Spirituality, Solidarity and Personal Development;
▪ Responding Where and How to help, in NGOs or projects with social impact;
▪ Building Bridges between companies and volunteers who want to help with NGOs that need help, generating bonds, visibility, awareness, advice, volunteering and training.
▪ Offering Retreats and Workshops, to get to know ourselves, grow spiritually and in solidarity, promoting change agents.

Our foundation is based on Christian values, with a comprehensive vision, and an innovative and methodological proposal, creating Networks, bringing together and uniting different actors or specialists in each action. Committed to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), Integral and Solidary Human Development of Social Doctrine and Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR);
